main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed at Cannon AFB in New Mexico on 3 October 1965, described as an 'Astro (Arcturus)'.
interesting points: The object was visible for 25 minutes,The object's size was noted to vary from that of a dime to a quarter at arm's length,It was reported that the object attracted the attention of observers due to its brilliance,The object performed a figure 8 pattern and spiraled in one area,No physical evidence of the phenomenon was recorded.
sighted object: an unidentified aerial object described as 'Astro (Arcturus)'
witness description: Henry S. Hadley, MSGT, Supply SQ, NCDIC, with an average reliability estimate
